column5: Who is watching UFC right now? I saying Silva for the win against Griffin, Silva is fighting at 205 again. For the main event I think Bj Penn is going to win unless Kenny cuts him up with his elbows and there is doctor stoppage.
I paid to watch the last one,100. I think Grif can win. As for Penn, Kenny should kick his donkey shark skin ass.
Wow Silva dismantled Griffin like it was no problem. KO in the first round, very impressive at 205.
Silva made it look like Griffin didn't show up for the fight
If anyone can post up all the winners....I didn't see any of it.

BJ Penn defeats Kenny Florian via submission (rear naked choke) in round four Anderson Silva defeats Forrest Griffin via TKO (Strikes) Round 1 Johnny Hendricks defeats Amir Sadollah via TKO (Strikes) Round 1 Ricardo Almeida defeats Kendall Grove via Unanimous Decision Kurt Pellegrino defeats Josh Neer via Unanimous Decision Aaron Riley defeats Shane Nelson via Unanimous Decision John Howard defeats Tamdan McCrory via split decision Alessio Sakara defeats Thales Leites via split decision Matt Riddle defeats Dan Cramer via unanimous decision George Sotiropoulos defeats George Roop via submission (kimura) in round two Jesse Lennox defeats Danillo Villefort via technical knockout (cut) in round three here is two fights http://www.mmashare.com/bj-penn-vs-kenny-f...-101-t8742.html http://www.mmashare.com/anderson-silva-vs-...-101-t8743.html
Thanks for all the hard work into this reply......rear naked choke for Penn. wow he must had some kind of burst of energy in Rd 4
the knock out by Silva was one of the best Ive seen in a while ! Made griffin look stupid.... maybe thats why he ran out right after the fight ! hhaah a
Hey guys, all fights can be seen on www.mma-core.com
